plot: For as long as Adam can remember, Pot has been his cure-all. But when true addiction slaps him in the face, will he stick by his drug of choice?
title: Breaking
plot_es: For as long as Adam can remember, Pot has been his cure-all. But when true addiction slaps him in the face, will he stick by his drug of choice?
plot_en: For as long as Adam can remember, Pot has been his cure-all. But when true addiction slaps him in the face, will he stick by his drug of choice?
